wikipedia_page.main: Chris Martin (born 1 November 1971) is a British Paralympian track and field athlete competing in category F33 throwing events. He has represented Great Britain in four Paralympic Games.  Martin has won two gold and one silver Paralympic medals in Discus and Javelin and won three gold medals in the IPC World Championship.  He was the World record holder from 1995-2005, IPC World Championship record holder from 1998-2011, Paralympics record holder from 1996-2008 all for F33 Discus.
